item.title: Classifications of Rule Breaking
item.description: When rules are broken, there appears to be three classifications, with one special case. These rules will be ordered based on increasing severity, assuming the same rule is broken.

item.title: Community Moderator
item.description: A Community Moderator (Moderator) is a member of Staff Members who disciplines members who break rules or philosophies. As they are staff members, they are expected to uphold staff responsibilities.

item.title: Repercussions of Non-abiding Staff
item.description: Staff Members that don’t abide to the server’s rules and philosophies create confusion among [[Members]]. Members will think that an action is okay, when in fact it is not.

item.title: Staff Members
item.description: Staff Members (Staff) are members of management. Responsibilities Staff are the face of the server; they act as role models and uphold the server’s rules and philosophies.

item.title: Transparency on Bans
item.description: Scenario For this discussion, we will assume an obedient member, Bob. Bob really likes the server, but he’s dealing with personal drama that’s really getting to him.
